about_the_game:
Lowpoly drift games are a thrilling type of racing game that stands out with its unique and stylish graphics that use simplified, low-polygon models. In this type of game, players take control of a car and race through a series of tracks while attempting to perform spectacular drifts around tight corners.

Players must balance speed and control to maintain their drifts and avoid crashing, while also trying to earn as many points as possible. The game features a variety of different tracks, each with its own set of challenges and obstacles, and players can customize their cars with different engine specs to improve their performance.

In addition to the single-player campaign, there is multiplayer where players can team up with friends to simply enjoy the thrill of racing together. With fast-paced gameplay, silly visuals, and a strong emphasis on skillful driving, lowpoly drift offer a unique and thrilling racing experience that is sure to keep players engaged and entertained.
